Vancouver Design Week

  • Web,
  • Editorial,
  • Ad

Vancouver Design Week is a non-profit social enterprise with the mission to promote and celebrate designers of all disciplines in Vancouver. I joined the organizing team initally as a part of the web team. As we neared towards launching our 2017 event, I jumped around branding, print design, social media and coordination, where needed.

Visit the site

Full team here

Copyright ©2017, Sean Durfee – Give me a shout!

Colophon: This site was built by myself by hand in HTML and SCSS. Fonts are Freight Sans + Freight Text by Joshua Darden, and are served up with Adobe Typekit. Everything is compiled and served through Jekyll, hosted on Github Pages. Thanks for stopping by!
